title: Israel Watch Face: Interactive
summary: Israel Watch Face - Best interactive city watch face for Android Wear devices.
description: Enjoy the most unique skyline silhouettes of Israel with Israel Watch Face - The best interactive city watch face for Android Wear devices.* Instructions *After the installation, please open the companion phone app named "Israel Watch Face" at least once, in order to start the weather updates and in order to configure your watch face design.Through the companion phone app you can design every element in your watch face.*Key features*✔ Configurable Israel skyline type: colors or black & white✔ Automatically changing skyline during the day✔ Optional automatic design that changes the watch face colors during the day according to time✔ Battery Percentage indicator for Wear✔ Temperature & weather indicators by OpenWeather weather provider✔ Continuous heart rate measurements upon pressing the heart icon✔ Configurable time format: 12/24 hour ✔ Configurable date format: many options✔ Configurable day format: long/short✔ Configurable background colors✔ Configurable time / am pm indicator / date / temperature / battery colors✔ Configurable time / am pm indicator / date / temperature / battery size✔ Configurable to set the weather update frequencyNo more surprises with the battery indicatorWorried about the remaining battery? Israel watch face provides the battery indicator that Android Wear devices lacks.Supported devices:Motorola Moto360, Motorola Moto360 2, Huawei Watch, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2)
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy the most unique skyline silhouettes of Israel with Israel Watch Face - The best interactive city watch face for Android Wear devices.

* Instructions *

After the installation, please open the companion phone app named "Israel Watch Face" at least once,
in order to start the weather updates and in order to configure your watch face design.
Through the companion phone app you can design every element in your watch face.

*Key features*

✔ Configurable Israel skyline type: colors or black & white
✔ Automatically changing skyline during the day
✔ Optional automatic design that changes the watch face colors during the day according to time
✔ Battery Percentage indicator for Wear
✔ Temperature & weather indicators by OpenWeather weather provider
✔ Continuous heart rate measurements upon pressing the heart icon
✔ Configurable time format: 12/24 hour
✔ Configurable date format: many options
✔ Configurable day format: long/short
✔ Configurable background colors
✔ Configurable time / am pm indicator / date / temperature / battery colors
✔ Configurable time / am pm indicator / date / temperature / battery size
✔ Configurable to set the weather update frequency

No more surprises with the battery indicator
Worried about the remaining battery? Israel watch face provides the battery indicator that Android Wear devices lacks.

Supported devices:
Motorola Moto360, Motorola Moto360 2, Huawei Watch, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2)
comments: Huawei Watch Received message "No device connected"
recentChanges: - Fix crash for Android Wear app
